metadata.title: CVE-2023-32439 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue isfixed in iOS 16.5.1 and iPadOS 16.5.1, iOS 15.7.7 and iPadOS 15.7.7, macOSVentura 13.4.1, Safari 16.5.1. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
